title: Covid: Boris Johnson sets new booster target over 'Omicron tidal wave'
content:
1. Covid: Boris Johnson sets new booster target over 'Omicron tidal wave'  BBC News
  2. Watch in full: Boris Johnson announces new Covid booster targets  The Independent
  3. UK's Johnson warns of Omicron 'tidal wave', says two doses not enough  Reuters UK
  4. Britain Accelerates Plan to Get Third Shot in All Adults  The New York Times
  5. All adults to be offered Covid booster jabs before New Year, says Boris Johnson  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
